item.description:
Don't want to go to a bar/club that cost $100...or wait around till midnite for fireworks...then join us for fireworks and dinner. We will meetup to view the ice sculptures and then the fireworks on the Boston Commons. We will go to Chinatown for dinner after the fireworks.

Please be on time - meetup at 6pm @ Dunkin Donuts (across from Boylston Street T stop - Green Line). The fireworks begin at 7 pm sharp.

Dinner/restaurant: Vinh Sun @ 58 Beach St. in Chinatown (after firework)

If you already have plans, we wish you a safe & happy New Year's eve!
item.how_to_find_us: We will provide our cell phone to those that RSVP

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: NY's Eve - Fire & Ice
